alert.note: Alert for Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 2:24PM EDT until July 14 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Tuscola County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 223 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Caro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kingston around 235 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Wilmot, East Dayton and Deford. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
